channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mura O Te Ahi
channel.desc: Hilarious 'debating' competition showcasing M?ori humour and wit entirely in the M?ori language. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ki Tua
channel.desc: Ki Tua is a podcast with a difference, covering current events and important issues through to formative moments in their lives. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te K?uta
channel.desc: A risque chat show talked around the fireplace in a Te K?uta. (R).

channel.title: Whakaata M?ori
channel.desc: Whakaata M?ori specialises in the stories of Aotearoa. Be entertained and informed with news, current affairs, sports, drama, documentaries and much more.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kori Club
channel.desc: Kori Club is a captivating series for 0-8-year-olds that marries the charm of "The Wiggles" with the magic of Te Ao M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mahi Pai
channel.desc: Along with host Te Ataakura Pewhairangi the taniwha are back for Season 2 of Mahi Pai. This episode looks at k?ura Kori. (R).

channel.title: He Rourou
channel.desc: An instructional cooking series aimed at tamariki and wh?nau. (R).

channel.title: Darwin and Newts
channel.desc: An animated series for youngsters who love to figure out how things work. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: While Kura, Josh and Kazumi follow a trail of maero footprints, Rangi is playing games with rangatira o patupaiarehe on top of the misty maunga. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te N?tube
channel.desc: Two clever cousins, Atareta and Te Haakura, share their world with their followers. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kia Mau
channel.desc: A fun sing-along M?ori performing arts series for children. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Pamu Kumara
channel.desc: Tai and her superhuman wh?nau run their local vege shop from their k?mara farm. The tupu are dying and Tai pushes past her fear of her matakitetanga. (R).

channel.title: Cube
channel.desc: An exciting youth series and a hub for rangatahi content. (R).

channel.title: P?kana 2025
channel.desc: Te Reo M?ori entertainment programme for Kura and Kura Kaupapa tamariki / taiohi. (R).

channel.title: P?kana 2025
channel.desc: Te Reo M?ori entertainment programme for Kura and Kura Kaupapa tamariki / taiohi. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ariki
channel.desc: Young M?ori battle it out in the revolutionary M?ori martial arts competition based upon mau r?kau. Te Akerautangi vs Te Aka Raukura. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?ku Reo
channel.desc: Professor John Moorfield's M?ori language course supported by an interactive website. (R).

channel.title: ?paki

channel.title: Ako

channel.title: Haka Regionals 2024
channel.desc: Highlights from the Haka Regionals 2024. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Haka Regionals 2024
channel.desc: Highlights from the Haka Regionals 2024. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waka To Worlds
channel.desc: Following the lives of the New Zealand Waka Ama Elite Junior Men and Women's teams as they train their hearts out in the quest for gold at the 2022 IVF World Sprint Championships. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Ring Inz
channel.desc: Teeps is struggling to come up with a whakaeke and enlists the help of a dodgy source. Meanwhile, Fanny offers Mavis her wedding planner services and she won?t take no for an answer. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Hakapedia
channel.desc: The ultimate game show where Haka freaks battle it out. OG P?kana presenters M?tai Smith and Te Hamua Nikora battle it out for the Kura they are repping. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waiata Nation II
channel.desc: A whole new group of Maori artists take on the challenge to create their own waiata, and become the next maori songbird. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Wairua (Mts)
channel.desc: The topic of wairua will be covered and the question will be answered from a M?ori perspective of ancient times, through to the present. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Karanga The First Voice
channel.desc: Iwi around the motu explore and celebrate karanga in contemporary Aotearoa. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Whaik?rero
channel.desc: Whaik?rero masters and practioners examine formal oral traditions from the T?maki Makaurau region, and scrutinise the evolution of this art form in a contemporary world. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ata Toi + Wai
channel.desc: Join the dynamic trio Chey Milne, Tawaroa Kawana and Jordyn With A Why as they celebrate music through a distinctly M?ori lens. Pere Wihongi shares their journey and the state of M?ori music. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waiata Anthems
channel.desc: Confronting barriers to her true potential, MAJIC finds the support of her whanau to elevate herself to new artistic heights, exemplifying the self-determination of M?ori through her new waiata.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waiata Anthems
channel.desc: After disconnecting from Te Ao M?ori in his teens, Chase Woods follows in the footsteps of his M?ori ?superheroes? to reclaim his personal journey.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kai T?
channel.desc: A video podcast series that provides a unique insight into the world of moko and the life of a kai t?. Artists from Moko 101 discuss the establishment of Moko Ora. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Uka
channel.desc: R?nui Primary are up against Te K?hanga o Tokomaru and Te Tapuaekura play Puurekireki Marae. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Aroha Nui Say I Do
channel.desc: Wellington celebrant Richard Tankersly gets to wed one of his good mates in Akaroa. Despite living in different cities, the wedding planning has been a breeze until he arrives at the venue. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Hur? P?pi II
channel.desc: Rawiri and Api offer a glimpse into their bustling city life as a wh?nau, sharing the ways in which they balance work and wh?nau, and the challenges of raising p?pi in an urban environment. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?ku Whare K?hanga Reo
channel.desc: Communities give some much needed love to tired and run-down k?hanga across New Zealand. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Super Kura
channel.desc: The official blessing of the Puna Reo approaches and Mungzy needs a haircut, which is not an easy job. Clara is overwhelmed by the aroha shown by the Kaikohe community. (R).

channel.title: Mulan: Princess Warrior
channel.desc: Disguised as a man to take her father?s place, Mulan is a rebellious soldier. She is sent on a mission and discovers a conspiracy against her country. (R).

channel.title: Kair?kau
channel.desc: Te Purewa declares war while Ruamahu??is consumed by revenge. Te Huru's loyalty is questioned and Tionga is lured into a trap. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Breaking Silence
channel.desc: NZ Police Detective Jaimie-Leigh shares her story of trauma to inspire that one?s past need not define their future, and dreams can come true. (R).
